title: Poster, "Exhibition Poster for Robert Indiana, Number Paintings: Museum Hans Lange Krefled", 1966
title_raw: Exhibition Poster for Robert Indiana, Number Paintings: Museum Hans Lange Krefled
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right corner: "R. Indiana '66"
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite, lower left corner: "For Doreen & Rolf"
Imprinted in black ink, bottom: "ROBERT INDIANA/ NUMBER/ PAINTINGS/ MUSEUM HAUS LANGE KREFELD/ Wilhelmshofallee  91/ 11. Juni - 24 Juli 1966/ Täglich, auch sonntags, 10 - 13 und/ 14.30 - 18 Uhr/ samstags 10 -13 Uhr,/ montags und 17. Juni geschlossen"
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster reproducing the artist's "'Number Paintings 0-9" (in a set of small and large images in gray and orange tones).    Text in black  at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Exhibition Poster for Robert Indiana, Number Paintings: Museum Hans Lange Krefled", 1966. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-13.
